title: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West renew their vows for fifth wedding anniversary
text:
Kim and Kanye have tied the knot… again (Picture: Stephen Lovekin/BEI/REX )

Kim Kardashian and Kanye West renewed their vows on their fifth wedding anniversary.

The couple tied the knot on 24 May, 2014 in a lavish ceremony at Fort di Belvedere in Florence, Italy, which boasted a celebrity guestlist including Andrew Bocelli, John Legend, Chrissy Teigen, Steve McQueen, Jaden Smith, Olivier Rousteing and Alexander Wang.

But five years on, they decided to cement their love in a much more low-key setting.

Kim, 38, threw her husband a surprise vow renewal which took place off camera shortly after the birth of their fourth child Psalm.

On the latest episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians, Kim explained that she was planning something special for her and Kanye’s fifth wedding anniversary, but was forced to ruin the surprise after finding out that the rapper, 42, was also planning an anniversary surprise.

Kim said: ‘Things are definitely more chaotic like all the time, but I make it a serious point to spend time with him.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Kanye knows that I’ve had such anxiety with the new baby and everything going on. He’s stepped up so much and has been the most amazing dad, playing all the games with the kids and things like that.’

The social media queen threw the vow renewal with their family in attendance, and wore a white dress for the occasion.

However, the actual ceremony was not filmed for the show, with Kim explaining: ‘I think it’s so special that all four of our kids are here. It’ll just be really sweet, and I’m excited that everyone is coming over.

‘We wanted to keep it really personal and it’s private for us.’

Kim did reveal the first line of her vows, though, reading: ‘You are my husband. You are my best friend. My biggest believer and my one true love.’

N’aww.

Kimye’s vow renewal came after the birth of their son Psalm, who was born via surrogate on 10 May.

Discussing his birth, Kim – who is also mum to North, six, Saint, three, and one-year-old Chicago – insisted that four is enough when it comes to kids.

She said: ‘Our surrogate is so amazing. She had the easiest delivery. She pushed literally maybe one time. Kourtney and Kanye were in the room with me.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I feel so complete. I really do feel like four is the perfect number for me. I feel so full in the best way, but I’m done.’

And on the show, the lawyer-in-training revealed that Psalm could have been called Ye, after his daddy.

‘His name was going to Ye, but Kanye didn’t like Ye because Ye it doesn’t mean anything.

‘We looked up every name in the bible that had Ye in the beginning, and the only name was Yehezkel, and Kylie called at the last second and was like, “no!”Pslam and Saint sound good together.’

description: Kim Kardashian and Kanye West renewed their vows for their fifth wedding anniversary.
